ygData.subject: Re: The Seige
ygData.msgSnippet: wait, nevermind, I got it. Marine was the first one to see her coming. Iron Raptor, leader of the Maximals. The first glimpse of her he had ever seen. Her

wait, nevermind, I got it.

       Marine was the first one to see her coming. Iron Raptor, leader of the 
Maximals. The first glimpse of her he had ever seen. Her synthetic muscles 
flexed as she barrled towrds them, holding something in her hand.
       "Continue the attack, I will deal with her." The giant turtle bot 
said. His green armor plating reflected the sun, and a small hum signaled his 
dual shoulder missle launchers setteling on his broad shoulders.
       Jade eyes watched her feverishly coming closer. It was clear now that 
in her hand she held some kind of blade, poised to land in his body no doubt. 
He couldnt let the Fem get any closer than she already was. Hand to hand 
combat would be out of the question. It was time to act, and quickly.
       Noting her leadership abilities, and the sheer fact that her group 
still endured while under constant attack made Marine question what he could 
do. His internal processor assesed the probability of her next move. She was 
to smart to come in, head on, even in her super mode. This was going to have 
to knock her off her feet.
       Two black missles streaked out of the launchers with a trail of grey 
smoke tailing them. The projectiles quickly cut through the air and met there 
target: the right and left side of Iron Raptor. The two side explosions 
caused a bright rose of flame and sent debris scattering. 
       Marine quickly scanned the destroyed area. His jade eyes pulsed with 
an optic blast ready to take her down agian if needed. He knew that his move 
wasnt a checkmate, only to knock her down. Now the hard part came in.

--part1_d3.1332a163.2804ed43_boundary
